title: The Asset Allocator: A Time For Leadership
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: With job losses shattering records in the wake of the coronavirus, an obvious question advisors are thinking about is: ‘What about mine?’ This podcast (6:45) suggests that now is a time that financial advisors can have a greater impact than ever before - by learning, teaching and leading. Helping people see that they have a financial future is what will make advisors’ own futures viable. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
